Notes: A large caterpillar enemy that moves on a set path. Unlike its smaller variants, it always moves on its path and it cannot be defeated. However, the player can bounce off of its body parts. It can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Body Parts
Obj_arg0.Description: How many body parts it consists of. Minimum is 3, maximum is 13, default is 9.

Obj_arg1.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg1.Description: Its path movement speed multiplied by 100. Default is 100.

Obj_arg2.Name: Is Angry?
Obj_arg2.Description: If set, it will turn red and move around more aggressively.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

Group.Description: If any of the Big Wigglers in this group gets frozen by the Orange Luma, all of them will stop moving as well.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
